title: Job search - the pre-interview (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of Employment, Education and Training, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Applications for positions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Applications for positions
description: Through the eyes of three school leavers, we see how jobs are researched using available community resources to obtain work information. Use of the CES, municipal libraries, newspapers and parental advice is covered. The program also covers the correct preparation of job applications.
